name: Gates to Terra - Overlords PC
description:
Gates to Terra is a turn-based strategy where you will command multiple heroes, collect gold, buy units and upgrade to outmatch your opponents. Challenge different kinds of opponents, plan your attacks, anticipate enemy movements and prove your strength as commander!

FEATURES:

COMMAND MULTIPLE HEROES:
Choose and command up to 10 selected heroes with different strengths and weaknesses. Unlock new heroes and experiment with different lineups.

COMMAND MULTIPLE UNITS:
Combine your forces of heroes with units to make the strongest and the most formidable army.

MULTIPLE SKILLS:
Prove yourself and your strength as a commander on the battlefield. use different skills and powerfull abilities to defeat your enemies.

MULTIPLE GAME MODES:
Train your commanding skills with multiple variety of single-player modes.

PVP MULTIPLAYER:
If you think you are ready to challenge different opponents, play with different players in PVP with Pass and Play and NetPlay.

- Multiple Heroes, Units & Skill Cards
- Tons of Upgrade selections to experiment
- Unlock new heroes
- Single-Player campaigns & Scenarios to train
- Challange different people in Multiplayer

If you have questions, comments or suggestions, mail me at seasonquest.mail@gmail.com
